synonyms: saptadaśe—in the Seventeenth Chapter; vana-pathe—through the forest path; mathurā-gamana—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu's going to Mathurā; aṣṭādaśe—in the Eighteenth Chapter; vṛndāvana-vihāra-varṇana—description of His touring the forest of Vṛndāvana.
translation: In the Seventeenth Chapter I have described the Lord's journey through the great forest of Jhārikhaṇḍa and His arrival at Mathurā. In the Eighteenth Chapter there is a description of His tour of the forest of Vṛndāvana.
